an4.24:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sākete viharati kāḷakārāme.
an4.24:5.1: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa samārakassa sabrahmakassa sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā, tamahaṃ jānāmi.
an4.24:6.1: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa samārakassa sabrahmakassa sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā, tamahaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ.
an4.24:6.2: Taṃ tathāgatassa viditaṃ, taṃ tathāgato na upaṭṭhāsi.
an4.24:7.1: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa samārakassa sabrahmakassa sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā, tamahaṃ na jānāmīti vadeyyaṃ, taṃ mamassa musā.
an4.24:8.1: Yaṃ, bhikkhave … pe … tamahaṃ jānāmi ca na ca jānāmīti vadeyyaṃ, tampassa tādisameva.
an4.24:9.1: Yaṃ, bhikkhave … pe … tamahaṃ neva jānāmi na na jānāmīti vadeyyaṃ, taṃ mamassa kali.
an4.24:10.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, tathāgato daṭṭhā daṭṭhabbaṃ, diṭṭhaṃ na maññati, adiṭṭhaṃ na maññati, daṭṭhabbaṃ na maññati, daṭṭhāraṃ na maññati;
an4.24:10.2: sutvā sotabbaṃ, sutaṃ na maññati, asutaṃ na maññati, sotabbaṃ na maññati, sotāraṃ na maññati;
an4.24:10.3: mutvā motabbaṃ, mutaṃ na maññati, amutaṃ na maññati, motabbaṃ na maññati, motāraṃ na maññati;
an4.24:10.4: viññatvā viññātabbaṃ, viññātaṃ na maññati, aviññātaṃ na maññati, viññātabbaṃ na maññati, viññātāraṃ na maññati.
an4.24:10.5: Iti kho, bhikkhave, tathāgato diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu dhammesu tādīyeva tādī.
an4.24:10.6: ‘Tamhā ca pana tādimhā añño tādī uttaritaro vā paṇītataro vā natthī’ti vadāmīti.
an4.24:11.1: Yaṃ kiñci diṭṭhaṃva sutaṃ mutaṃ vā,
an4.24:12.1: Etañca sallaṃ paṭikacca disvā,
